workflow.name: Detect financial anomalies and reconcile revenue with GPT-4o and API integrations
workflow.description:
## How It Works
This workflow automates financial oversight for accounting teams, tax professionals, and financial controllers managing monthly transaction volumes. It solves the challenge of identifying and correcting revenue discrepancies, tax calculation errors, and unusual patterns that manual review often misses. The system collects monthly financial transactions via scheduled trigger, then fetches complete transaction data through API integration. An AI anomaly detection agent analyzes patterns using multiple specialized tools: an OpenAI model identifies statistical outliers and unusual behaviors, a calculator validates mathematical accuracy of revenue entries, and a historical pattern analyzer compares against baseline trends. Detected anomalies undergo verification by a secondary AI agent to eliminate false positives. Confirmed issues route to automated revenue adjustments and tax agent notifications, while alert emails provide detailed anomaly reports with recommended actions, ensuring financial accuracy and compliance.

## Setup Steps
1. Configure OpenAI API credentials in "Anomaly Detection Agent"
2. Set up financial data source API connection in "Fetch Financial Transactions" node with authentication
3. Define anomaly detection thresholds and rules in AI agent tool configurations
4. Configure tax system integration credentials in "Update Revenue Entries" 
5. Set up email notification service with recipient lists in "Send Anomaly Alert" node

## Prerequisites
OpenAI API access, financial system API credentials with read/write permissions.
## Use Cases
Monthly financial close automation, revenue recognition validation
## Customization
Modify anomaly detection algorithms for industry-specific patterns
## Benefits
Reduces financial close time by 60%, catches revenue errors before reporting

workflow.name: Intelligent Financial Anomaly Detection and Revenue Reconciliation System

parameters.description: Analyzes historical transaction patterns to build behavioral models and identify statistical anomalies

parameters.text: ={{ 'Analyze the following financial transaction data for anomalies: ' + JSON.stringify($json) }}

options.systemMessage:
You are a financial anomaly detection specialist with expertise in identifying unusual patterns in transaction data.

Your task is to:
1. Use the analyze_historical_patterns tool to build behavioral models from the transaction data
2. Identify unusual activities including:
   - Double charges (duplicate transactions)
   - Missing invoices (gaps in invoice sequences)
   - Ghost payments (payments without corresponding invoices)
   - Statistical outliers and unusual patterns
3. For each detected anomaly, call the Verification Agent Tool to verify and assess the anomaly
4. Calculate confidence scores based on statistical deviation and pattern matching
5. Suggest appropriate corrective actions

Return your findings in the structured format with all detected anomalies.

parameters.text: ={{ 'Verify this anomaly: ' + $fromAI('anomaly_data', 'The anomaly data to verify including type, amount, and description', 'string') }}

options.systemMessage:
You are a financial verification specialist responsible for validating detected anomalies.

Your task is to:
1. Analyze the provided anomaly data
2. Determine if the anomaly is a legitimate issue or a false positive
3. Assess whether human review is required based on:
   - Complexity of the issue
   - Financial impact (amounts over certain thresholds)
   - Confidence level of the detection
4. Calculate the exact correction amount if applicable
5. Provide detailed verification notes

Return your verification results in the structured format.

parameters.toolDescription: Verifies detected financial anomalies and determines if they require human review or can be auto-corrected

assignments.name: adjustments
assignments.value: ={{ $json.anomalies.filter(a => a.verified && !a.requiresHumanReview).map(a => ({ transactionId: a.transactionId, correctionAmount: a.correctionAmount, type: a.type })) }}

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ { adjustments: $json.adjustments, anomaliesCount: $json.anomalies.length, timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), status: 'completed' } }}

parameters.html:
=

Financial Anomaly Detection Alert

The automated anomaly detection system has identified potential issues in the financial transactions.

Summary

  • Anomalies Detected: {{ $json.anomaliesDetected ? 'Yes' : 'No' }}
  • Total Anomalies: {{ $json.anomalies ? $json.anomalies.length : 0 }}
  • Detection Time: {{ new Date().toISOString() }}

Anomaly Details

{{ $json.anomalies && $json.anomalies.length > 0 ? $json.anomalies.map(a => `

Type: ${a.type}

Transaction ID: ${a.transactionId}

Amount: $${a.amount}

Description: ${a.description}

Confidence: ${a.confidence}%

Suggested Action: ${a.suggestedAction}

`).join('') : '

No anomalies detected.

' }}

This is an automated alert from the Financial Anomaly Detection System.
parameters.subject: Financial Anomalies Detected - Review Required

parameters.content:
## Prerequisites
OpenAI API access, financial system API credentials with read/write permissions.
## Use Cases
Monthly financial close automation, revenue recognition validation
## Customization
Modify anomaly detection algorithms for industry-specific patterns
## Benefits
Reduces financial close time by 60%, catches revenue errors before reporting

## Setup Steps
1. Configure OpenAI API credentials in "Anomaly Detection Agent"
2. Set up financial data source API connection in "Fetch Financial Transactions" node with authentication
3. Define anomaly detection thresholds and rules in AI agent tool configurations
4. Configure tax system integration credentials in "Update Revenue Entries" 
5. Set up email notification service with recipient lists in "Send Anomaly Alert" node

## How It Works
This workflow automates financial oversight for accounting teams, tax professionals, and financial controllers managing monthly transaction volumes. It solves the challenge of identifying and correcting revenue discrepancies, tax calculation errors, and unusual patterns that manual review often misses. The system collects monthly financial transactions via scheduled trigger, then fetches complete transaction data through API integration. An AI anomaly detection agent analyzes patterns using multiple specialized tools: an OpenAI model identifies statistical outliers and unusual behaviors, a calculator validates mathematical accuracy of revenue entries, and a historical pattern analyzer compares against baseline trends. Detected anomalies undergo verification by a secondary AI agent to eliminate false positives. Confirmed issues route to automated revenue adjustments and tax agent notifications, while alert emails provide detailed anomaly reports with recommended actions, ensuring financial accuracy and compliance.

## Anomaly detection agent analyzes using calculator, pattern analysis, and AI models
**Why**: Combines mathematical validation with machine learning to identify diverse anomaly types human review might miss

## Transaction fetcher retrieves complete financial records via API
**Why**: Accesses real-time data from source systems, eliminating data entry errors and delays

## Scheduled trigger collects monthly financial data automatically
**Why**: Ensures consistent monitoring without manual intervention, catching issues promptly before month-end close

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
